description:
A dissection of a rather simple API endpoint.

Some likely topics:
- NoFramework is the new NoSQL
- Fat Models
- Bearer Tokens, JWTs & true stateless APIs
- Postgres Common Table Expressions and window functions 

http://act.yapc.eu/ye2016/talk/6714
title: Thomas Klausner: How to write an API endpoint in 2016‎ - YAPC::Europe 2016
